Player History
Drafted in 34th round, 542nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Injured on 6/17/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 5/4/2018 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/2018 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/24/2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/29/2019, off Saul Trejo (KC)...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 5/11/2020 (Going to HOU: 2B James Goodridge, 3B James Truman. Going to DET: P Rodney Schloss)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2021, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,614,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
